basic.name: Grievous Throw (Q)
basic.description: Zul'jin throws an axe forward, dealing 125 damage to the first 2 enemies hit and marking them for 6 seconds. Marked enemies take 50% bonus damage from Zul'jin's next 3 Basic Attacks against them.

basic.name: Twin Cleave (W)
basic.description: Throw 2 axes in a large, circular arc, dealing 112 damage and Slowing affected enemies by 15% per axe for 2 seconds.

basic.name: Regeneration (E)
basic.description: Zul'jin channels to regenerate 30% of his maximum Health over 4 seconds. Moving while channeling or taking damage will interrupt this effect.

basic.name: Amani Rage (?)
basic.description: Activate to cause Zul'jin to instantly lose 50% of his current Health and heal for that amount over 10 seconds.

heroic.name: Taz'dingo! (R)
heroic.description: For the next 4 seconds, Zul'jin is Unkillable, and cannot be reduced to less than 1 Health. Taz'dingo!

heroic.name: Guillotine (R)
heroic.description: Zul'jin launches a massive axe into the air that drops on the targeted area, dealing 330 damage plus bonus damage the lower his Health is.

trait.name: Berserker (T)
trait.description: Activate to increase Basic Attack damage by 25% but consume 2% maximum Health per attack.Passive: Zul'jin attacks 1% faster for every 1% of maximum Health missing.You Want Axe?Quest: Every 5 Basic Attacks against Heroes permanently increases Basic Attack damage by 1.Reward: After attacking Heroes 75 times, Basic Attack range is increased by 1.1.Reward: After attacking Heroes 150 times, Twin Cleave now revolves twice.

1.name: Boneslicer
1.description: Grievous Throw now pierces through all enemies hit and restores 15 Mana per Hero hit. Additionally, Grievous Throw's mark is no longer removed by Basic Attacks.

1.name: Recklessness
1.description: While Zul'jin is below 75% Health, he gains 10% Spell Power. While he is below 50% Health, his Basic Attack damage is increased by 15% and Basic Attacks against Heroes grant an additional stack of You Want Axe?.

1.name: Headhunter
1.description: Quest: Zul'jin's first Takedown against each enemy Hero permanently increases his damage dealt by 2%.Reward: After getting Takedowns on every enemy Hero, Basic Attack range is increased by 1.1.

4.name: Troll's Blood
4.description: Increase Regeneration's healing by 25%. If Regeneration fully finishes, restore 10% of Zul'jin's maximum Mana.

4.name: Voodoo Shuffle
4.description: Activate to remove Roots and Slows.Passive: Lower the cooldown and Mana cost of Regeneration by 40%.

4.name: Amani Hide
4.description: Lower the cooldown of Amani Rage by 10 seconds and gain 15 Armor while regenerating Health from it.

7.name: Vicious Assault
7.description: Increase the duration of Grievous Throw's mark by 3 seconds and its damage bonus by 45%.

7.name: Arcanite Axes
7.description: Quest: Twin Cleave's damage is permanently increased by 0.75 every time it hits a Hero.

7.name: Ferocity
7.description: Increases the Attack Speed bonus of Berserker by 40%.

10.name: Taz'dingo!
10.description: For the next 4 seconds, Zul'jin is Unkillable, and cannot be reduced to less than 1 Health. Taz'dingo!

10.name: Guillotine
10.description: Zul'jin launches a massive axe into the air that drops on the targeted area, dealing 330 damage plus bonus damage the lower his Health is.

13.name: Lacerate
13.description: Increase the Slow amount of each Twin Cleave axe by 10% and its duration by 0.5 seconds.

13.name: Eye of Zul'jin
13.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes grant Zul'jin 6% Movement Speed for 2 seconds, up to 30%.

13.name: Ensnare
13.description: Throw a net forward, Rooting the first enemy Hero hit for 1.5 seconds. If no Heroes are hit, Ensnare's cooldown is reduced to 10 seconds.

16.name: No Mercy!
16.description: Zul'jin's Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes marked with Grievous Throw ignore Armor and deal an additional 2% of maximum Health as damage.

16.name: Wrong Place Wrong Time
16.description: If an enemy is hit by both Twin Cleave axes at the same time, they take an additional 100 damage and count as 5 Hero hits for You Want Axe?.

16.name: Let the Killing Begin
16.description: When Zul'jin kills an enemy, his Attack Speed is increased by 5%, up to 40%, for 12 seconds. Basic Attacks refresh the duration.Hero Takedowns instantly grant 40% Attack Speed.

20.name: Amani Resilience
20.description: Increase Taz'dingo's duration by 1 second. Upon expiring, Zul'jin heals for 50% of the damage he dealt during Taz'dingo.

20.name: Buzzsaw
20.description: After impact, Guillotine continues forward, dealing 75% damage to enemies hit. If a Hero is killed by Guillotine, Zul'jin is instantly healed to full.

20.name: Forest Medicine
20.description: Regeneration is no longer Channeled, and cannot be interrupted.

20.name: A Surprise For Ya
20.description: Basic Attacks bounce to a nearby enemy for 50% damage, prioritizing enemy Heroes.
